channel.title: [pi] auto-keep / autodrop
channel.description:
you know how in pi you can go back and get your fire cape if its dropped..
i want to know where i can add more item ids.
++ thank you!!

item.title: [pi] auto-keep / autodrop
item.dc:creator: @Dell Dell
item.description:
@Dell wrote:

[quote=“Canownueazy, post:4, topic:375474”][quote author=Dell link=topic=471419.msg3447983#msg3447983 date=1293557342]

No I don’t know how because PI is horrible.

Anyway, do you have a Player class? Or something like a death task?

player class
[/quote]Okay search 6570 in it, and somewhere you should find what you need[/quote]

nothing, idk where else it could be. .

Read full topic
